content.title: Rename Security Rule in PAN-OS (v11.0+)
content.summary: Renames an existing security rule within a specified configuration scope such as 'vsys'. This action does not modify any rule logic or attributes, only the rule's name. It uses the :rename action suffix and does not require a request body.

required_query_parameters.location: Defines the configuration scope, such as 'vsys' or 'shared'.
required_query_parameters.vsys: Required if location is 'vsys'. Example: vsys1.
required_query_parameters.name: Specifies the current name of the security rule.
required_query_parameters.newname: Specifies the new name to apply to the security rule.

common_errors: 400: Missing or invalid query parameters (location, vsys, name, or newname)
404: Rule with the specified current name not found
409: A rule with the new name already exists
